title: Vaibhavi Emerald Diamond Haaram - A Royal Ensemble
materials: South Sea Pearls (25.35ct total). Exquisite Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: A breathtaking three-tiered Haaram featuring floral motifs intricately studded with Polki diamonds and accented with vibrant natural emeralds. The antique-inspired design with flower motifs is a testament to traditional South Indian craftsmanship. Locket is intricately desiged with diamonds and a center emerald, with South Sea pearls hanging at the bottom.
colors: enhanced by the rich green of the emeralds and the lustrous white of the South Sea pearls. A classic South Indian color palette signifying prosperity and new beginnings.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Muhurtham)
or any significant celebration where you want to make a statement. Equally stunning for high-profile social events.
description: This Vaibhavi Emerald Diamond Haaram is a true heirloom piece. The blend of traditional design with high-quality materials ensures lasting beauty and value. The craftsmanship and the symbolism of emeralds for growth and prosperity make it a truly special piece. Owning this is owning a piece of South Indian heritage.
